Name: ApplicationDate
Description: Define ApplicationDate as DATE w/ DEF=TODAY
SourceCode:
DEFINE DATE ApplicationDate AS 'Application date'
BETWEEN 01.01.1900 AND TODAY
DEFAULT TODAY
ENDDEFINE

Name: ISR_AVAILABLE
Description: Define ISR_AVAILABLE (International Search Report) as BOOLEAN w/ DEF=TRUE
SourceCode:
DEFINE BOOLEAN ISR_AVAILABLE AS 'Is ISR available?'
DEFAULT TRUE
ENDDEFINE

Name: ISA
Description: Define ISA as LIST w/ DEF=ISA_NONE
SourceCode:
# International Search Authority
DEFINE LIST ISA AS 'Which ISA searched the PCT application?'
CHOICE ISA_NONE AS 'NONE OF THE LIST'
CHOICE ISA_AT AS 'AT - ATPO'
CHOICE ISA_CA AS 'CA - CIPO'
CHOICE ISA_EPO AS 'EP - EPO'
CHOICE ISA_ES AS 'ES - OEPM'
CHOICE ISA_FI AS 'FI - PRH'
CHOICE ISA_SE AS 'SE - PRV' 
CHOICE ISA_TR AS 'TR - Turkpatent'
CHOICE ISA_NPI AS 'XN - NPI'
CHOICE ISA_VI AS 'XV - Visegrad Patent Institute'
DEFAULT ISA_NONE
ENDDEFINE

Name: IPRP (IPER)
Description: Define IPRP as LIST w/ DEF=IPRP_NONE
SourceCode:
# International preliminary report on patentability (Chapter II of the PCT; IPER)
DEFINE LIST IPRP AS 'Which office provided an IPRP (Chapter II)/IPER?'
CHOICE IPRP_NONE AS 'NONE'
CHOICE IPRP_AU AS 'IP Australia'
CHOICE IPRP_AT AS 'Austrian Patent Office'
CHOICE IPRP_BR AS 'National Institute of Industrial Property (Brazil)'
CHOICE IPRP_CA AS 'Canadian Intellectual Property Office'
CHOICE IPRP_CL AS 'National Institute of Industrial Property of Chile'
CHOICE IPRP_CN AS 'China National Intellectual Property Administration (CNIPA)'
CHOICE IPRP_EG AS 'Egyptian Patent Office'
CHOICE IPRP_EPO AS 'European Patent Office (EPO)'
CHOICE IPRP_ES AS 'Spanish Patent and Trademark Office'
CHOICE IPRP_FI AS 'Finnish Patent and Registration Office (PRH)'
CHOICE IPRP_IL AS 'Israel Patent Office'
CHOICE IPRP_IN AS 'Indian Patent Office'
CHOICE IPRP_JP AS 'Japan Patent Office'
CHOICE IPRP_KR AS 'Korean Intellectual Property Office'
CHOICE IPRP_PH AS 'Intellectual Property Office of the Philippines'
CHOICE IPRP_RU AS 'Federal Service for Intellectual Property, Patents and Trademarks (Russian Federation)'
CHOICE IPRP_SE AS 'Swedish Intellectual Property Office (PRV)'
CHOICE IPRP_SG AS 'Intellectual Property Office of Singapore'
CHOICE IPRP_TR AS 'Turkish Patent and Trademark Office'
CHOICE IPRP_UA AS 'Ministry for Development of Economy, Trade and Agriculture of Ukraine, Department for Development of Intellectual Property'
CHOICE IPRP_USPTO AS 'United States Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO)'
CHOICE IPRP_XN AS 'Nordic Patent Institute'
CHOICE IPRP_XV AS 'Visegrad Patent Institute'
DEFAULT IPRP_NONE
ENDDEFINE

Name: EntitySize
Description: Define EntitySize as LIST w/ DEF=Entity_Large
SourceCode:
DEFINE LIST EntitySize AS 'Entity size of applicant?'
CHOICE Entity_Person AS 'Natural person'
CHOICE Entity_Less25 AS 'Less than 25 employees'
CHOICE Entity_Less100 AS 'Less than 100, more than 25 employees'
CHOICE Entity_Large AS 'Large entity (default)'
CHOICE Entity_Small AS 'Small entity'
CHOICE Entity_Micro AS 'Micro entity'
DEFAULT Entity_Large
ENDDEFINE

Name: PriorityCount
SourceCode:
DEFINE NUMBER PriorityCount AS 'Number of priorities?'
BETWEEN 0 AND 100
DEFAULT 1
ENDDEFINE

Name: IndependentClaimCount
SourceCode:
DEFINE NUMBER IndependentClaimCount AS 'Number of independent claims?'
BETWEEN 1 AND 100
DEFAULT 1
ENDDEFINE

Name: ClaimCount
SourceCode:
DEFINE NUMBER ClaimCount AS 'Number of claims?'
BETWEEN 1 AND 1000
DEFAULT 1
ENDDEFINE
